alert.note: Alert for Cooke; Montague (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 04 at 4:48PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Montague and northwestern Cooke Counties through 515 PM CDT... At 448 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lake Muenster, or 17 miles southeast of Nocona, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Gainesville, Muenster, St. Jo, Lindsay, Lake Muenster, Hubert H Moss Lake, Marysville, Sivells Bend, and Myra. This includes Interstate 35 between mile markers 494 and 503. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for north central Texas.
